text: Ndipo anthu oumira, amene safuna kupereka gawo lina limene Mulungu wawapatsa kuchokera ku chuma chake, asaganize kuti ali kuchita zabwino. Iyayi, zidzawavuta. Zinthu zimene amabisa zidzamangidwa mâ€™makosi mwawo patsiku louka kwa akufa. Mulungu ndiye mwini wa chilichonse chimene chili mlengalenga ndi padziko lapansi ndipo Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse chimene mumachita
